properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL out 20 NM; Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL from 20 to 60 NM excluding the territorial waters of Bahamas; Coastal waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 5 at 1:44AM EST until January 5 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 38 kt and seas 6 to 9 feet. For the Small Craft Advisory,
north winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 6 to 9
feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach
FL out 20 NM, Coastal waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean
Reef FL out 20 NM and Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean
Reef FL from 20 to 60 NM excluding the territorial waters of
Bahamas.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 10 AM EST this morning. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to 1 AM EST
Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

A sudden onset of rough seas may cause hazardous conditions,
which may occur suddenly at jetties and inlets. These conditions
could catch boaters by surprise. Boaters should use caution when
entering or exiting the inlets and jetty areas.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 AM EST MONDAY
